pages.text: $(li)The Knockback enchantment can be applied in any kind of item.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the knockback strenght of the hits made with the enchanted item with this enchantment, pushing the creature hitted with it further.
pages.title: Knockback

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_knockback)Ancient Tome (Knockback)$(/l).
